blogPost.excerpt: Buffer’s https://buffer.com/engage helps small businesses stay on top of their Instagram comments and build a loyal and engaged audience. It automatically detects important interactions that need attention, and makes it quick and easy to reply or dismiss comments.
blogPost.body: Buffer’s https://buffer.com/engage helps small businesses stay on top of their Instagram comments and build a loyal and engaged audience. It automatically detects important interactions that need attention, and makes it quick and easy to reply or dismiss comments.
blogPost.title: Engagement by Buffer - A faster way to engage with your Instagram audience.
blogPost.author: Michael Eckstein

localize.description: Buffer的https://buffer.com/engage，帮助小企业保持对Instagram评论的关注，并建立忠诚和参与的受众。它能自动检测出需要关注的重要互动，并使回复或驳回评论变得快速而简单。
localize.tagline: 与你的Instagram受众互动的更快方式。

localize.description: Buffer的https://buffer.com/engage，幫助小企業保持對Instagram評論的關注，並建立忠誠和參與的受衆。它能自動檢測出需要關注的重要互動，並使回覆或駁回評論變得快速而簡單。
localize.tagline: 與你的Instagram受衆互動的更快方式。

previous.excerpt: Perch allows you to use your existing recurring expenses such as rent, Hulu and Spotify as credit worthy data to boost your credit score. ⠀ Now available on the iOS App Store!
previous.title: Perch Credit - Use recurring expenses to boost your credit score

localize.description: Perch允许您使用现有的经常性支出，如租金、Hulu和Spotify作为信用价值数据，以提高您的信用评分。⠀现在可以在iOS App Store上使用!
localize.tagline: 利用经常性支出来提高你的信用分数

localize.description: Perch允許您使用現有的經常性支出，如租金、Hulu和Spotify作爲信用價值數據，以提高您的信用評分。⠀現在可以在iOS App Store上使用!
localize.tagline: 利用經常性支出來提高你的信用分數

next.excerpt: Create tailored B2B sales emails with a click. Magic Sales Bot uses GPT-3 to create high-converting emails to send to your prospects, allowing you to prospect 10x faster.
next.title: Magic Sales Bot - Write sales emails 10x faster with GPT-3

localize.description: 一键创建定制的B2B销售邮件。Magic Sales Bot使用GPT-3创建高转化率的电子邮件发送给您的潜在客户，让您的潜在客户速度提高10倍。
localize.tagline: 使用GPT-3，销售邮件的撰写速度提高了10倍。

localize.description: 一鍵創建定製的B2B銷售郵件。Magic Sales Bot使用GPT-3創建高轉化率的電子郵件發送給您的潛在客戶，讓您的潛在客戶速度提高10倍。
localize.tagline: 使用GPT-3，銷售郵件的撰寫速度提高了10倍。
